examples: The disease causes progressive muscle weakness.
La enfermedad causa debilidad muscular progresiva.
The sudden weakness in her legs made her stumble.
La repentina debilidad en sus piernas la hizo tropezar.
He thought that crying was a sign of weakness.
Pensó que llorar era un signo de debilidad.
Asking for help would be an admission of weakness.
Pedir ayuda sería una admisión de debilidad.
